kw.doc: Simulates the user pressing key(s) to an element or on the active browser.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.arg: There is some other platform have more features. There is some other platform have more features.
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.
kw.msg: Typing text 'There is some other platform have more features. There is some other platform have more features.' into text field '//textarea[@name='other_trading_platforms']'.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.arg: Usability can be improve maybe. Just a dummy sentence.
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.
kw.msg: Typing text 'Usability can be improve maybe. Just a dummy sentence.' into text field '//textarea[@name='do_to_improve']'.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.arg: XXXX platform have more features and is better. There is some other platform have more features.
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.
kw.msg: Typing text 'XXXX platform have more features and is better. There is some other platform have more features.' into text field '//textarea[@name='other_trading_platforms']'.

kw.name: Element Should Not Contain
kw.arg: If you dont mind sharing, which other trading platforms do you use?
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` does not contain text ``expected``.
kw.msg: Element '//textarea[@name='other_trading_platforms']' does not contain text 'If you dont mind sharing, which other trading platforms do you use?'.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.arg: Usability can be improve maybe. Just a dummy sentence.

kw.name: Element Should Not Contain
kw.arg: What could we do to improve?
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` does not contain text ``expected``.
kw.msg: Element '//textarea[@name='do_to_improve']' does not contain text 'What could we do to improve?'.
